spirit.title: The Fattoush Spirit
spirit.description: A journey through the flavors of the Levant. Our cuisine celebrates sharing, freshness, and legendary Lebanese hospitality.

About.title: Our Story
About.history: The story of Fattoush begins in the vibrant narrative of Beirut's alleyways, where flavors mingle with laughter and lively conversations. Arriving in Geneva in 1990, we wanted to recreate this unique atmosphere: a generous table where every dish tells a story. For over 30 years, we have perpetuated the ancestral recipes of our grandmothers, adding our modern touch while respecting the authenticity of the products.
